title: Protecting Their Mate, Part Six
description: Protecting Their Mate, Part Six  As the full moon raises tensions--and appetites--Ashley indulges her wildest fantasies...and discovers what it truly means to belong to the pack.  This is the sixth installment in PROTECTING THEIR MATE, an erotic BBW paranormal romance serial set in the world of The Last Pack. It contains strong language and explicit sex with multiple partners. For adult readers.
author: Mia Thorne
